title: Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition [RePack] (2017)
description:
Release Date: April 7, 2017
Languages: English, Russian,French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese 

System Requirements:
OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit!) 
Processor: AMD A8-3850 and better 
Memory: 6 GB 
Video: Radeon HD 6850 or better 
DirectX: 11 
Disk Space: 11 GB

Description:
You - Grayson Hunt, formerly an elite assassin Dead Echo. After the collapse of the ship you were on a deserted planet Stygia resort and must make a choice: to flee or take revenge on the traitor. 
Earn points in a single game, 30 trials and 12 multiplayer stages of the system Skilshot Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition. 
Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition - is the possibility of Bulletstorm + Content Full Clip.
 
Release info:
Release is based on the Steam-ripping: 10.8 GB
Established medicine BALDMAN V3 (with the emulator ALI213)
100% Lossless and MD5 Perfect: all the files after you install the original release identical bit-accurate
Do not cut, no recoded
compression greatly improved (from 10.8 to 4.9 GB)
Installation takes 6-12 minutes (depending on your system)
After installing the game it takes 11 GB
After the installation is available checksums of all files check option, to make sure that repack establish normal
To install repack requires at least 2 GB of RAM (including virtual)
To change the language, use the "Language Selector.exe" in the folder "the Binaries / Win64" 

Installation:
Mount and Install
Play
